root.description: The trap door opens silently. The room is bright and warm, but eerie.
root.hint: Geralt: "Only one way to deal with a witch."

exit.description: A wooden [ladder] climbs down through a trap door in the floor.

prop.description: Fumes and flames erupt from a bubbling [cauldron].
prop.onCheck: Teeming with energy, it shakes and rattles at the witch's words.

prop.description: The [wolf] climbs into the room without a sound.
prop.onCheck: It glares at the [witch] but does not move.

character.description: [Joss] clings to the [wolf] with one arm.
character.onCheck: He is nearest to the trap door.
character.onTalk: He will not speak so close to the [witch].

character.description: Lurching and cackling, a [witch] cries some incantation in a hoarse voice.
character.onCheck: She is fat and aged, brimming with dark magic and a vile spirit.
character.onTalk: Witch: "Duplex duplus labos et tribulatio; ignis uro et lebes bullio."
